DOC.brief_summary: The percentage of participants with a serologic immune response (seroconversion or four-fold rise in rotavirus IgA antibodies) to rotavirus vaccine at 14 weeks of age among infants receiving zinc or probiotic supplements will be at least 15% higher and significantly better to that of infants who receive a placebo for zinc or probiotic supplement.
DOC.brief_title: Zinc and/or Probiotic Supplementation of Rotavirus and Oral Polio Virus Vaccines
